data.why:
I'd like to contribute another config file parser :-( with the
    following highligths:

    - macros - includes - multiline and here-docs - scopes - nearly no
    limitations on the datastructures - proper line numbers in the error
    messages even with #include's - semantic analysis hooks -
    inheritable

    based on Parse::RecDescent, what else? and everything within 450
    code lines

    Prefered Namespace: Config::Scoped

    Best Regards Charly
